title: Whole computer freezes immediately after loading into game
body: I've been playing league on my comp for awhile now, and I've never had any serious issues before. Starting today, however, as soon as I load into a game, as in, after champ select and the loading screen, my whole computer freezes up. I cant move the mouse, I can't alt-tab, pull up task manager or the start menu, and I get a monotone sound instead of music or lack thereof. This has happened three times so far, and I've already tried deleting and reinstalling league. Please help.

replies.body: I've seen a few reports on this, and it sounds like these crashes have been a result of either a recent windows update or the use of third party programs.  As a first and most common fix, if you are using any apps like play.tv go ahead and remove them.  Secondly, some change to the[ Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) is causing some freeze and should be **disabled**.  That should hopefully fix things up, but let me know!
Same here, I started getting this problem today after receiving the windows 10 anniversary update. My computer freezes in game and I have to restart it manually.
I have the same problem, I believe it is due to a recent windows 10 update. I'm currently attempting to restore my computer to previous settings without the update.
